attachments.text: The Uber brand is more than a name. It’s a set of values, attributes, and artwork that reflects the spirit of our company. Using it consistently will reinforce our passion and commitment to providing a world class experience.
attachments.fallback: The Uber brand is more than a name. It’s a set of values, attributes, and artwork that reflects the spirit of our company. Using it consistently will reinforce our passion and commitment to providing a world class experience.

text: hm. I like the idea, but this is really disorienting, and whats up with the micro-type?
i like that you can download assets from it pretty easily.
can’t tell you how many times (either or our work or for sponsorship stuff we do with other brands) how difficult it is to find those materials

Agree - that should be table stakes for brand guidelines! I think there’s just not that many companies publishing their guidelines on the web like this. Only companies that truly understand both brand and digital end up getting to this point.
